# Data visulalizaiton

```{r label = "model", fig.width = 12, fig.height = 9, fig.align = "center"}
par(mar = c(4, 4, 1, 1), mgp = c(2, 1, 0), cex = 0.8)
plot(cars, pch = 20, col = 'darkgray')
fit <- lm(dist ~ speed, data = cars)
abline(fit, lwd = 2)
```

# Conclusion

The scope of a simple linear regression is `r coef(fit)[2]`.
